comments:
The following appeared in my log after I deleted a JavaProject.

Incidental:
I had checked the project out of the dev.eclipse.org repository, but for some
reason it lost its CVS information (filed as Bug 12875). I was deleting it in
order to bring it in from the repository again.

Build 0402 had a bug that caused NPE you describe. The fix has been released in 
a follow-up build (0404).
